RF remote control included need router around 8 Feet from lock.

04_004_010.short_description: Secure your valuables with the Smart Biometric Cabinet Lock, featuring advanced fingerprint recognition technology for quick, keyless access and enhanced security. Ideal for homes and offices.
long_description: Smart and Keyless Security: Enjoy fingerprint or code control for effortless access. Experience Quick Unlock & Auto Lock features: Utilizing advanced fingerprint lock technology for enhanced responsiveness and sensitivity, unlocking in just 0.5 seconds. No need for extra cards, keys, apps, or Bluetooth connections—your fingerprints serve as the sole keys. Additionally, benefit from a 1-10 digit user code (PIN) and AI Memory capable of storing up to 20 fingerprints.
Battery: The power supply uses 3 x AAA batteries; Low-power design, works for about a year without having to change batteries . Low power warning, Micro USB port for providing power in emergencies
Motorised mechanism: Suitable for installation in drawer cabinets, single door, double door and other wooden cabinets Door thickness requirement > 10 mm, standard screw for 15-20 mm Door panel

Privacy Protection: More secure! Our fingerprint lock is definitely your choice to improve the safety of personal items and secrets! Especially If there’s a troublemaker at home. It can effectively prevent your files from getting messed up or items from being damaged Simple DIY Installation: Effortlessly install this lock with ease – suitable for any regular carpenter. Access our installation video for step-by-step guidance, and receive additional support from our customer care team via calls and video calls for a hassle-free setup experience.
